problem.markdown: >>If a machine breaks for a long time (e.g. until all local operations stop), which Kanban buffers become empty?<< (x) The withdrawal kanban buffers of the broken machine and the upstream machine. ( ) The withdrawal kanban buffer and the production kanban buffer of the broken machine. ( ) Withdrawal kanban buffers and production kanban buffers of both broken machine and upstream machine. ( ) The production kanban buffers of the broken machine and the upstream machine. [explanation] When a machine is down for a long time, parts continue to ship to the broken machine and previously finished parts continue to ship away from the broken machine until both withdrawal buffers reach empty. [explanation]
